00016 /*+ hlimits.h
00017    *** This file contains all hard coded limits for the library
00018    *** and reserved vdata/vgroup names and classes. 
00019    *** Also pre-defined attribute names are contained in thie file.
00020    + */
00021 
00022 #ifndef _HLIMITS_H
00023 #define _HLIMITS_H
00024 
00025 #ifndef _WIN32
00026 #define HDsetvbuf(F,S,M,Z)  setvbuf(F,S,M,Z)
00027 #endif
00028 /**************************************************************************
00029 *  Generally useful macro definitions
00030 *   (These are copied from hdfi.h and shoudl remain included in both files
00031 *       because hlimits.h is included from netcdf.h which is used in some
00032 *       netCDF utilities which don't need or want the rest of the HDF header
00033 *       files. -QAK - 2/17/99 )
00034 **************************************************************************/
00035 #ifndef MIN
00036 #define MIN(a,b)    (((a)<(b)) ? (a) : (b))
00037 #endif
00038 #ifndef MAX
00039 #define MAX(a,b)    (((a)>(b)) ? (a) : (b))
00040 #endif
00041 
00042 /* ------------------------- General Constants hdf.h  --------------------- */
00043 /* tbuf used as a temporary buffer for small jobs.  The size is
00044    preferably > 512 but MUST be > ~256.  It is advised that if an
00045    arbitrarily large buffer (> 100 bytes) is require, dynamic space be
00046    used.  tbuf lives in the hfile.c */
00047 
00048 #ifndef TBUF_SZ
00049 #if defined(macintosh) || defined(MAC) || defined(SYMANTEC_C)
00050 #   define TBUF_SZ      256
00051 #else  /* !macintosh */
00052 #   define TBUF_SZ     1024
00053 #endif /* !macintosh */
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 /*  File name max length (old annotations)  */
00057 #define DF_MAXFNLEN     256
00058 
00059 /*
00060    * some max lengths for the Vset interface
00061    *
00062    * Except for FIELDNAMELENMAX, change these as you please, they
00063    * affect memory only, not the file.
00064    *
00065  */
00066 
00067 #define FIELDNAMELENMAX    128  /* fieldname   : 128 chars max */
00068 #define VSFIELDMAX         256  /* max no of fields per vdata */
00069 #define VSNAMELENMAX        64  /* vdata name  : 64 chars max */
00070 #define VGNAMELENMAX        64  /* vgroup name : 64 chars max */
00071 /* Note: VGNAMELENMAX has been removed from library, test, and tools
00072    except in mfgr.c and Fortran interface, in favor of dynamic allocation.
00073    BMR- 1/28/2010 */
00074 
00075 /*
00076  * default max no of objects in a vgroup
00077  * VGroup will grow dynamically if needed
00078  */
00079 #define MAXNVELT            64
00080 
00081 /*
00082  * Defaults for linked block operations with Vsets
00083  */
00084 #define VDEFAULTBLKSIZE    4096
00085 #define VDEFAULTNBLKS        32
00086 
00087 /* Max order of a field in a Vdata */
00088 #define MAX_ORDER          65535
00089 #define MAX_FIELD_SIZE     65535
00090 
00091 
00092 /* ------------------------- Constants for hfile.c --------------------- */
00093 /* Maximum number of files (number of slots for file records) */
00094 #ifndef MAX_FILE
00095 #   define MAX_FILE   32
00096 #endif /* MAX_FILE */
00097 
00098 /* Maximum length of external filename(s) (used in hextelt.c) */
00099 #ifndef MAX_PATH_LEN
00100 #define MAX_PATH_LEN     1024
00101 #endif /* MAX_PATH_LEN */
00102 
00103 /* ndds (number of dd's in a block) default,
00104    so user need not specify */
00105 #ifndef DEF_NDDS
00106 #   define DEF_NDDS 16
00107 #endif /* DEF_NDDS */
00108 
00109 /* ndds minimum, to prevent excessive overhead of very small dd-blocks */
00110 #ifndef MIN_NDDS
00111 #   define MIN_NDDS 4
00112 #endif /* MIN_NDDS */
00113 
00114 /* largest number that will fit into 16-bit word ref variable */
00115 #define MAX_REF ((uint16)65535)
00116 
00117 /* length of block and number of blocks for converting 'appendable' data */
00118 /* elements into linked blocks (will eventually be replaced by the newer */
00119 /* variable-length blocks */
00120 #define HDF_APPENDABLE_BLOCK_LEN 4096
00121 #define HDF_APPENDABLE_BLOCK_NUM 16
00122 
00123 /* hashing information */
00124 #define HASH_MASK       0xff
00125 #define HASH_BLOCK_SIZE 100
00126 
00127 /* ------------------------- Constants for Vxx interface --------------------- */
00128 
00129 /*
00130  * Private conversion buffer stuff
00131  * VDATA_BUFFER_MAX is the largest buffer that can be allocated for
00132  *   writing (haven't implemented reading yet).
00133  * Vtbuf is the buffer
00134  * Vtbufsize is the buffer size in bytes at any given time.
00135  * Vtbuf is increased in size as need be
00136  * BUG: the final Vtbuf never gets freed
00137  */
00138 #define VDATA_BUFFER_MAX 1000000
00139

00143 #define DFSD_MAXFILL_LEN 16  /* Current max length for fill_value space */

00148 #define COMP_MAX_COMP   12
00149 #define COMP_HEADER_LENGTH  14

00151 /* ----------------- Constants for DGROUP interface --------------------- */
00152 #define MAX_GROUPS 8
00153 
00154 /* ----------------- Constants for HERROR interface --------------------- */
00155 #define FUNC_NAME_LEN   32
00156 
00157 /* error_stack is the error stack.  error_top is the stack top pointer, 
00158    and points tothe next available slot on the stack */
00159 #ifndef ERR_STACK_SZ
00160 #   define ERR_STACK_SZ 10

00168 /* ----------------- Constants for NETCDF interface(netcdf.h) ---------------- */
00169 /*
00170  * This can be as large as the maximum number of stdio streams
00171  * you can have open on your system.
00172  */
00173 #define H4_MAX_NC_OPEN MAX_FILE
00174 
00175 /*
00176  * These maximums are enforced by the interface, to facilitate writing
00177  * applications and utilities.  However, nothing is statically allocated to
00178  * these sizes internally.
00179  */
00180 #define H4_MAX_NC_DIMS 5000  /* max dimensions per file */
00181 #define H4_MAX_NC_ATTRS 3000     /* max global or per variable attributes */
00182 #define H4_MAX_NC_VARS 5000  /* max variables per file */
00183 /* This macro changed the behavior of the SDcreate function in HDF4r1.3
00184  * SDcreate started to fail if SDS name length was greater than 64, instead of truncating
00185  * it to 64 characters and creating a dataset. Switched back to the old definition.
00186  * EP 5/5/2000
00187 #define H4_MAX_NC_NAME MIN(256,MIN(VSNAMELENMAX,VGNAMELENMAX)) */
00188 
00189 #define H4_MAX_NC_NAME 256       /* max length of a name */
00190 #define H4_MAX_NC_CLASS 128         /* max length of a class name - added this
00191         because 128 was used commonly in SD for class name, and this will help
00192         changing the class name variable declaration much easier - BMR 4/1/02*/
00193 #define H4_MAX_VAR_DIMS 32          /* max per variable dimensions */
00194 
00195 /* These definitions here are for backward/forward compatibiliy since major
00196    constants were modified with H4 prefix to avoid conflicts with the
00197    real NetCDF-3 library   - EIP 9/5/07                                     */
00198 
00199 #ifdef H4_HAVE_NETCDF
00200 #define MAX_NC_OPEN  H4_MAX_NC_OPEN
00201 #define MAX_NC_DIMS  H4_MAX_NC_DIMS
00202 #define MAX_NC_VARS  H4_MAX_NC_VARS
00203 #define MAX_NC_NAME  H4_MAX_NC_NAME
00204 #define MAX_NC_CLASS H4_MAX_NC_CLASS
00205 #define MAX_VAR_DIMS H4_MAX_VAR_DIMS
00206 #endif
00207 
00208 /* ----------------- Constants for MFGR interface --------------------- */
00209 #define H4_MAX_GR_NAME 256       /* max length of a name */
00210 
00211 #endif /* _HLIMITS_H */

00213 /* -----------  Reserved classes and names for vdatas/vgroups -----*/
00214 
00215 /* The names of the Vgroups created by the GR interface, from mfgr.h */
00216 #define GR_NAME "RIG0.0"          /* name of the Vgroup containing all the images */
00217 #define RI_NAME "RI0.0"           /* name of a Vgroup containing information a
00218                                      bout one image */
00219 #define RIGATTRNAME  "RIATTR0.0N" /* name of a Vdata containing an 
00220                                      attribute */
00221 #define RIGATTRCLASS "RIATTR0.0C" /* class of a Vdata containing an 
00222                                      attribute */
00223 /* Vdata and Vgroup attributes use the same class as that of SD attr,
00224  *  _HDF_ATTRIBUTE  "Attr0.0"  8/1/96 */
00225 
00226 /* classes of the Vdatas/Vgroups created by the SD interface, 
00227    from local_nc.h  */
00228 #define _HDF_ATTRIBUTE         "Attr0.0" 
00229         /* class of a Vdata containing SD interface attribute */
00230 #define _HDF_VARIABLE          "Var0.0"
00231         /* class of a Vgroup representing an SD NDG */
00232 #define _HDF_SDSVAR            "SDSVar"
00233         /* class of a Vdata indicating its group is an SDS variable */
00234     /* - only after hdf4r2 */
00235 #define _HDF_CRDVAR          "CoordVar"
00236         /* name of a Vdata indicating its group is a coordinate variable */
00237     /* - only after hdf4r2 */
00238 #define _HDF_DIMENSION         "Dim0.0"
00239         /* class of a Vgroup representing an SD dimension */
00240 #define _HDF_UDIMENSION        "UDim0.0"
00241         /* class of a Vgroup representing an SD UNLIMITED dimension*/
00242 #define DIM_VALS          "DimVal0.0"
00243         /* class of a Vdata containing an SD dimension size and fake values */
00244 #define DIM_VALS01        "DimVal0.1"
00245              /* class of a Vdata containing an SD dimension size */
00246 #define _HDF_CDF               "CDF0.0"
00247 /* DATA is defined in DTM. Change DATA to DATA0 
00248   #define DATA              "Data0.0" */
00249 #define DATA0             "Data0.0"
00250 #define ATTR_FIELD_NAME   "VALUES"
00251 
00252 /* The following vdata class name is reserved by the Chunking interface.
00253    originally defined in 'hchunks.h'. The full class name 
00254    currently is "_HDF_CHK_TBL_0". -GV 9/25/97
00255 
00256    Made the vdata class name available to other interfaces since it is needed
00257    during hmap project. -BMR 11/11/2010 */
00258 #define _HDF_CHK_TBL_CLASS "_HDF_CHK_TBL_" /* 13 bytes */
00259 #define _HDF_CHK_TBL_CLASS_VER  0          /* zero version number for class */
00260 
00261 /*
00262 #define NUM_INTERNAL_VGS    6
00263 char *INTERNAL_HDF_VGS[] = {_HDF_VARIABLE, _HDF_DIMENSION, _HDF_UDIMENSION,
00264          _HDF_CDF, GR_NAME, RI_NAME}; 
00265 
00266 #define NUM_INTERNAL_VDS    8
00267 char *INTERNAL_HDF_VDS[] = {DIM_VALS, DIM_VALS01, _HDF_ATTRIBUTE, _HDF_SDSVAR,
00268          _HDF_CRDVAR, "_HDF_CHK_TBL_", RIGATTRNAME, RIGATTRCLASS};
00269 
00270 */

00272 /* For MFGR interface */
00273 #define FILL_ATTR    "FillValue"   
00274           /* name of an attribute containing the fill value */
00275 
00276 /* For SD interface  */
00277 #define _FillValue      "_FillValue"
00278           /* name of an attribute to set fill value for an SDS */
00279 #define _HDF_LongName "long_name" /* data/dimension label string  */
00280 #define _HDF_Units    "units"     /* data/dimension unit string   */
00281 #define _HDF_Format   "format"    /* data/dimension format string */
00282 #define _HDF_CoordSys "coordsys"  /* data coordsys string         */
00283 #define _HDF_ValidRange     "valid_range" /* valid range of data values  */
00284 #define _HDF_ScaleFactor    "scale_factor" /* data calibration factor    */
00285 #define _HDF_ScaleFactorErr "scale_factor_err" /* data calibration factor error */
00286 #define _HDF_AddOffset      "add_offset" /* calibration offset           */
00287 #define _HDF_AddOffsetErr   "add_offset_err" /*  calibration offset error */
00288 #define _HDF_CalibratedNt   "calibrated_nt"  /* data type of uncalibrated data */
00289 #define _HDF_ValidMax       "valid_max"
00290 #define _HDF_ValidMin       "valid_min"
00291 #define _HDF_Remarks        "remarks"        /* annotation, by DFAN */
